metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6332 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1,when $wgBlockDisablesLogin is true, might allow remote attackers to obtainsensitive information by leveraging failure to terminate sessions when auser account is blocked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6332` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
